import React, { useState, useEffect } from 'react'; import PodPayLayout from './PodPayLayout'; import { usePodcastData } from '../hooks/usePodcastData'; import { MoreHorizontal, Play, Eye, Edit, Trash2 } from 'lucide-react'; export default function PodcastPage({ userInfo }) { const { podcasts, currentPodcast, loading, error } = usePodcastData(userInfo); // Mock episodes data that matches the screenshot const mockEpisodes = [ { id: 1, title: "Lorem Ipsum", status: "Schedule", publishedDate: "Jan 6, 2025", format: "Audio", preRolls: 1, midRolls: 1, postRolls: 1 }, { id: 2, title: "Lorem Ipsum", status: "Schedule", publishedDate: "Jan 6, 2025", format: "Audio", preRolls: 1, midRolls: 1, postRolls: 1 }, { id: 3, title: "Lorem Ipsum", status: "Schedule", publishedDate: "Jan 6, 2025", format: "Audio", preRolls: 1, midRolls: 1, postRolls: 1 }, { id: 4, title: "Lorem Ipsum", status: "Schedule", publishedDate: "Jan 6, 2025", format: "Audio", preRolls: 1, midRolls: 1, postRolls: 1 } ]; if (loading) { return (
); } if (error) { return (

Error loading podcast: {error}

 ); } const podcast = currentPodcast || { title: "Listen to the people's voice", image_url: "/api/placeholder/300/300", primary_category: "Audio", description: "Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet, consectetur adipiscing elit. Donec sit amet tincidunt tellus. Vestibulum ante ipsum primis in faucibus orci luctus et ultrices posuere cubilia curae; Suspendisse euismod ornare urna eu mollis. Cras vel diam ac nibh accumsan ornare quis quis nisl.\n\nLorem ipsum dolor sit amet, consectetur adipiscing elit. Donec sit amet tincidunt tellus. Vestibulum ante ipsum primis in faucibus orci luctus et ultrices posuere cubilia curae; Suspendisse euismod ornare urna eu mollis. Cras vel diam ac nibh accumsan ornare quis quis nisl.", managedBy: "https://podcastpayouts.com/" }; return (
